PlayGroundCanvas.canvasNotSupported: Your browser does not seem to support HTML5 canvas. Please use browser with HTML5 canvas support.

PlayGroundDescription.instructionItem1: Let's grab the small circle on the arc of the big circle with mouse or touch. Move it counterclockwise.
PlayGroundDescription.instructionItem2: As the small circle moves, the angle of the colored area changes.
PlayGroundDescription.instructionItem3: Try to make a right angle and straight angle.
